content:
GlyphType Enum

Definition

Specifies the type of glyph for elements with a bitmap background.

In this Article

public enum GlyphType
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
GlyphType

Remarks

The GlyphType values represent the return values of the GetEnumValue method when it is called with an argument value of System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty.

Fields

FontGlyph

The glyph is a font.
ImageGlyph

The glyph is a bitmap.
None

The element does not include a glyph.
